short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Edit the CSS of a page to make it look better

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restyle allows users to create css presets for websites to make ugly pages look less ugly. This allows you to fix websites with poor scaling, light mode only, or just bad design.
